// src/pages/About.js import React from 'react'; import '../styles/about.css'; function About() { return (

Hey there, I'm Sara!

A budding Data Analyst with a passion for turning data into actionable insights. I bring a keen eye for detail and a dedication to innovation.

My journey is driven by a strong desire to excel, and I am eager to develop skills in data analysis, statistical modeling, and collaboration. I look forward to working on diverse projects that will allow me to grow and refine my abilities.

Before coming to Trinity College Dublin to pursue my degree in Data Science, I worked at many thriving companies. These roles enhanced my collaboration and communication skills, giving me valuable experience working with cross-functional teams.

Journey from Writing <code> to Solving Problems using Data üìä

Since high school, I've been hooked on tech innovations and breakthroughs. Acing my 10th-grade exams, especially in math, stats, and science, set me on this path. In 11th grade, I coded a simple C++ game, and seeing it come to life was mind-blowing. That's when I knew I wanted to pursue a Bachelor's in Information Technology at Vishwakarma Institute, Pune. During the COVID-19 lockdown, I dove into Machine Learning projects using SVM and Na√Øve Bayes on all kinds of data‚Äîtext, photos, audio, and more. Data fascinates me, and I'm always looking forward to new opportunities to ace this field!

Other Interests
